ygData.subject: Re: cant hit melee thing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it s lonely at the top . Unless you are in a very regular band of people, who adventure together all the time - and usually exclude others then, which
ygData.messageBody:
According to Lim Dul:
> I can see your point, but I don't think Verant intended for people to be
> grouping with party members to are that far apart in Levels. Otherwise,
> what's to stop us from grouping with 40+ levelers and going after Giants and
> Dragons! :) Yeah, damn exciting...but pointless. ;)

"it's lonely at the top".
Unless you are in a very regular band of people, who adventure together all
the time - and usually exclude others then, which would be counterproductive -
you will have a good difference between lower levels and uppers within the
party.

The problem kicks in then.

I think Verant tend to ignore any whine "we are underpowered". But they
definitively won't ignore "people don't want to group with me for reason X"
when the reason X is *objective* (such as the magic resistance factor), as
opposed to a dislike based on perceived prejudice (rogues suck - enchanter
suck and so on).

--
